data.lyric:
[ti:brutal (Explicit)]
[ar:Olivia Rodrigo]
[al:SOUR (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]brutal (Explicit) - Olivia Rodrigo
[00:04.37]Lyrics by：Daniel Nigro/Olivia Rodrigo
[00:08.75]Composed by：Daniel Nigro/Olivia Rodrigo
[00:13.13]I want it to be like messy
[00:14.37]
[00:21.81]I'm so insecure I think
[00:23.86]That I'll die before I drink
[00:25.79]And I'm so caught up in the news
[00:27.68]Of who likes me and who hates you
[00:29.62]And I'm so tired that I might
[00:31.62]Quit my job start a new life
[00:33.51]And they'd all be so disappointed
[00:35.45]'Cause who am I if not exploited
[00:37.44]And I'm so sick of seventeen
[00:39.38]Where's my f**king teenage dream
[00:41.28]If someone tells me one more time
[00:43.18]"Enjoy your youth" I'm gonna cry
[00:45.14]And I don't stick up for myself
[00:47.05]I'm anxious and nothing can help
[00:48.98]And I wish I'd done this before
[00:50.88]And I wish people liked me more
[00:53.00]All I did was try my best
[00:54.80]This the kinda thanks I get
[00:56.78]Unrelentlessly upset
[00:59.01]Uh oh
[01:00.57]They say these are the golden years
[01:02.57]But I wish I could disappear
[01:04.41]Ego crush is so severe
[01:06.40]God it's brutal out here
[01:08.48]
[01:16.09]I feel like no one wants me
[01:18.08]And I hate the way I'm perceived
[01:19.99]I only have two real friends
[01:21.95]And lately I'm a nervous wreck
[01:23.75]'Cause I love people I don't like
[01:25.60]And I hate every song I write
[01:27.62]And I'm not cool and I'm not smart
[01:29.62]And I can't even parallel park
[01:31.67]All I did was try my best
[01:33.57]This the kinda thanks I get
[01:35.43]Unrelentlessly upset
[01:37.21]
[01:37.85]Uh oh
[01:39.08]They say these are the golden years
[01:41.23]But I wish I could disappear
[01:43.19]Ego crush is so severe
[01:45.22]God it's brutal out here
[01:47.14]
[01:51.87]She's having a really good time
[01:53.36]
[02:04.00]Got a broken ego broken heart
[02:10.72]
[02:12.80]And God I don't even know where to start
data.trans:
[ti:brutal (Explicit)]
[ar:Olivia Rodrigo]
[al:SOUR (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.37]//
[00:08.75]//
[00:13.13]我想一切变得混乱起来
[00:14.37]
[00:21.81]我担心着
[00:23.86]在我可以喝酒之前我就会离开这世界
[00:25.79]我陷在那些报道中
[00:27.68]关于谁喜欢我谁讨厌我
[00:29.62]我厌倦了一切或许我会
[00:31.62]放弃我的工作开始新的人生
[00:33.51]然后人们就会对我感到失望
[00:35.45]若我不被媒体炒作 我又算得上谁
[00:37.44]讨厌十七岁的年纪
[00:39.38]我的年少之梦何在
[00:41.28]如果有人再对我说
[00:43.18]”享受你的青春年华“ 我会落泪
[00:45.14]我也不会为我自己辩解
[00:47.05]整日忧虑惆怅 没有人能将我拯救
[00:48.98]我多希望我早已越过这种难关
[00:50.88]我希望人们能喜欢我多一些
[00:53.00]我已竭尽全力
[00:54.80]这就是我所收到的感谢
[00:56.78]无止境的心烦意乱
[00:59.01]//
[01:00.57]人们说现在是大好时光
[01:02.57]但我希望我能消失
[01:04.41]感觉我自尊心已经受到严重摧毁
[01:06.40]天哪这个世界如此残酷
[01:08.48]
[01:16.09]感觉没有人渴望我
[01:18.08]我讨厌别人对我的误解
[01:19.99]我只有两个真心的朋友
[01:21.95]最近我的精神变得极度紧张
[01:23.75]因为我爱上了我不喜欢的人
[01:25.60]我讨厌我写的每一首歌
[01:27.62]我一点都不酷我也不太聪明
[01:29.62]我甚至不可以把车泊好
[01:31.67]我已竭尽全力
[01:33.57]这就是我所收到的感谢
[01:35.43]无止境的心烦意乱
[01:37.21]
[01:37.85]//
[01:39.08]人们说现在是大好时光
[01:41.23]但我希望我能消失
[01:43.19]感觉我自尊心已经受到严重摧毁
[01:45.22]天哪这个世界如此残酷
[01:47.14]
[01:51.87]她正享受其中
[01:53.36]
[02:04.00]自尊受损 破碎的心
[02:10.72]
[02:12.80]天哪我都不知道该从何说起
